name: Arrow Financial Corporation
description: Arrow Financial Corporation is a publicly traded bank holding company headquartered in Glens Falls, New York. Established in 1983, the company operates as the parent of Arrow Bank, providing a wide range of financial services including commercial and retail banking, investment management, and insurance. Arrow Financial Corporation is dedicated to serving its local communities and emphasizes the importance of customer service and relationship-building. The bank offers a variety of products such as personal and business checking accounts, savings accounts, loans, mortgages, and credit cards. In addition, it provides investment services including wealth management and financial planning tailored to meet individual client needs. Arrow Financial Corporation prides itself on its commitment to community involvement and supports various local initiatives and charities. The company has demonstrated consistent growth and stability, focusing on prudent lending practices and maintaining a strong capital position. As part of its strategic plan, Arrow is also exploring digital banking solutions to enhance customer experience and streamline operations. With a strong emphasis on integrity, professionalism, and innovation, Arrow Financial Corporation aims to be the preferred financial partner for individuals and businesses in its market.
